How many people are affected by sialuria ?,"Fewer than 10 people worldwide have been diagnosed with sialuria. There are probably more people with the disorder who have not been diagnosed, as sialuria can be difficult to detect because of its variable features.",GHR,sialuria
What are the genetic changes related to sialuria ?,"Mutations in the GNE gene
